contentList.content: Call upon magical glamour to hide your altered body.
Call upon magical glamour to hide your altered body to stage [1].
Call upon magical glamour to hide your altered body.
Remove body glamour to show your true form in all its glory.
Unveil your remodelled body in all its glory.
Base game model, no remodelled frame passive.
Like pain, your body can only tolerate so much pleasure. When you experience more pleasure stacks than you can tolerate, you collapse. It slowly decays over time, and can be decreased via abilities.
Like pain, the body can only tolerate so much pleasure. The duration of this status is how much <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LI_PLEASURE">Pleasure</LSTag> you can tolerate.
Overwhelmed with pleasure, you are incapacitated and cannot think straight.
Your mind is distracted by the afterglow of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LI_BLISS">Bliss</LSTag>. You receive -1 to <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>.

Your mind is occupied by the afterglow of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LI_BLISS">Bliss</LSTag>, preventing you from forming any complex thoughts. You receive -2 to <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>, and -1 to <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>.

Your mind is dominated by the afterglow of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LI_BLISS">Bliss</LSTag>, preventing you from forming any coherent thoughts. You receive -2 to <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>, -2 to <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, and -1 to <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>.

Your mind is completely dominated by the afterglow of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LI_BLISS">Bliss</LSTag>, preventing you from forming any thoughts. You receive -2 to <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>, -2 to <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, -2 to <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>.
Your mind is tamed by overwhelming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LI_BLISS">Bliss</LSTag>, incapacitating you.
